resources.string: Coin Flip lets you spin a coin to randomly get either Heads or Tails.
Counter lets you count things by clicking the Add button. Your count is saved even when you close the app. Press the Clear button to start at 0.
Finally, with Choice you can add any number of things to a list and press the Choose! button to randomly select a choice from the list.
More items for the Utility Watch will be added soon!
